member.name: M:BookPub.Filters.ActionFilters.ValidateUpdate_FilterAttribute.OnActionExecuting
member.summary:
Filters incoming update requests and ensures that:
⠀ • Change id: an id for the item to change has been provided,
⠀ • Item id: the incomming item has an id,
⠀ • Match: the change id and the item id match.
member.remarks: The ⠀ character is an empty braile character which therefore looks like whitespace without being white space. In these xml documents, it is perfect for indentation, as all other white space characters are ignored.
